posts.post_content:
I don't think this is better than Nomad Purebred, Nomad could block in almost every possible scenario Dromad could be blocking a creature with higher P than 1, also it could benefit from other sources of damage such as 'deal 2 damage to all non flying creatures', etc.  
  
So no, this is far worse.
